Interface EnsembleVoting

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Parameterizable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EnsembleVotingInverseMultiplicative, EnsembleVotingMax, EnsembleVotingMean, EnsembleVotingMedian, EnsembleVotingMin, EnsembleVotingMultiplicative

    public interface EnsembleVoting
extends Parameterizable
    Interface for ensemble voting rules

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      double combine(double[] scores)
      Combine scores function.

    • Method Detail

      • combine

        double combine(double[] scores)
        Combine scores function. Note: it is assumed that the scores are comparable.
        Parameters:
        scores - Scores to combine
        Returns:
        combined score.

      • combine

        double combine(double[] scores,
             int count)
        Combine scores function. Note: it is assumed that the scores are comparable.
        Parameters:
        scores - Scores to combine
        count - Number of entries to use.
        Returns:
        combined score.
